label: uncl8051
comment: Code qualifying a specific stage of transport.

values.label: Inland transport
values.comment: Transport by which goods are moved from or to the frontier, or between inland points.

values.label: At the statistical territory limit
values.comment: Point by which the means of transport are presumed to have left the statistical territory of despatch or to have entered the statistical territory of arrival.

values.label: At arrival
values.comment: Transport by which goods are moved to the place of arrival.

values.label: Means of transport at transit
values.comment: The means of transport used to carry goods that have come under transit procedures of the customs administration to which a transit declaration is being made.

values.label: Means of transport crossing the regulatory border
values.comment: The means of transport moving into and out of a regulatory territory.

values.label: Means of transport at first port of arrival into regulatory territory
values.comment: The means of transport moving into a regulatory territory at the first port of arrival.

values.label: Pre-carriage transport
values.comment: Transport by which the goods are moved prior to their main carriage transport.

values.label: At border
values.comment: Transport by which goods are moved to the Customs frontier.

values.label: At departure
values.comment: Transport by which goods are moved from the place of departure.

values.label: At destination
values.comment: Transport by which goods are moved at the place of destination.

values.label: Main carriage - fourth carrier
values.comment: The fourth carrier of the ordered transport.

values.label: Main carriage - fifth carrier
values.comment: The fifth carrier of the ordered transport.

values.label: Main carriage - sixth carrier
values.comment: The sixth carrier of the ordered transport.

values.label: Main carriage - seventh carrier
values.comment: The seventh carrier of the ordered transport.

values.label: Main carriage - eighth carrier
values.comment: The eighth carrier of the ordered transport.

values.label: Main-carriage transport
values.comment: The primary stage in the movement of cargo from the point of origin to the intended destination.

values.label: Main carriage - first carrier
values.comment: The first carrier of the ordered transport when more than one carrier is involved.

values.label: Main carriage - second carrier
values.comment: The second carrier of the ordered transport when more than one carrier is involved.

values.label: Main carriage - third carrier
values.comment: The third carrier of the ordered transport when more than one carrier is involved.

values.label: Inland waterway transport
values.comment: Transport by which goods are moved via an inland body of water.

values.label: Delivery carrier all transport
values.comment: Carrier responsible from the point of origin to the final delivery destination.

values.label: Second pre-carriage transport
values.comment: Second transport by which the goods are moved prior to their main carriage transport.

values.label: Pre-acceptance transport
values.comment: The transport by which the goods are moved to the place of acceptance.

values.label: Second on-carriage transport
values.comment: Second transport by which the goods are moved after the main carriage transport.

values.label: Main carriage - ninth carrier
values.comment: The ninth carrier of the ordered transport.

values.label: On-carriage transport
values.comment: Transport by which the goods are moved after the main carriage transport.

values.label: Main carriage - tenth carrier
values.comment: The tenth carrier of the ordered transport.

values.label: Main carriage - eleventh carrier
values.comment: The eleventh carrier of the ordered transport.

values.label: Main carriage - twelfth carrier
values.comment: The twelfth carrier of the ordered transport.

values.label: Overflight
values.comment: The movement of a conveyance through the airspace over the territories of a country without landing within the territories of the country.
